channel.title: AWS on Aspect
channel.description: Recent content in AWS on Aspect

item.title: Configuration
item.description: Aspect follows the same credential discovery flow as the AWS CLI since Aspect is based ontop of the AWS SDK for .NET. The search for credentials is in the following order and uses the first available set for the current application: A credentials profile with the name specified by a value in environment variable AWS_PROFILE. The default credentials profile. SessionAWSCredentials that are created from the AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID, AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY, and AWS_SESSION_TOKEN environment variables, if theyâ€™re all non-empty.
